Intro.title: We create IT teams for technology projects

Services.title: Services
Services.serviceDesc1: Closing individual positions, as well as selecting a team for a startup or department
Services.serviceLabel2: Outsourcing of developers and project teams
Services.serviceDesc3: Selection of senior managers and rare IT specialists
Services.serviceDesc4: We help beginners, experienced experts and those who want to change direction in achieving career goals

Benefits.title: Benefits of working with us
Benefits.benefit1: Individual approach and maximum immersion in the project
Benefits.benefit5: Assistance in the adaptation of candidates to a new workplace

WorkWithUs.title: Work with us
WorkWithUs.text: People are the most valuable asset of our business, so we create the most comfortable and productive environment for our employees. Become part of our team and work on a project that you will share with others with interest.

Clients.title: Clients about us
Clients.clientDesc1: A cool team of professionals, quickly adapting to periodically changing customer requirements, performing the tasks in a quality and timely manner
Clients.clientDesc2: madjoylab promptly provided mobile and backend developers, which made it possible to strengthen the team and accelerate the development of projects in a targeted manner
Clients.clientPosition2: Project Manager of the group of companies "PIK"
Clients.clientDesc3: During the work on the project, the developers led by madjoylab showed themselves as a team of professionals who successfully solved all the tasks assigned to them and achieved the goal of the project
Clients.clientDesc4: The guys from madjoylab developed a massive system that required extremely high technical expertise and allowed us to take the service on board aircraft to a new level.
Clients.clientDesc5: The design solutions proposed by the team's specialists for the implementation of the required functionality made it possible to obtain a high-quality product with a convenient user interface. All assigned tasks were completed on time and in full.
Clients.clientDesc6: During the cooperation on a number of projects, madjoylab has established itself as a reliable partner, always striving to solve the tasks in the most efficient way, to select the necessary resources.
